item.title: Mentioned by CBC.ca
item.description:
'Bums' and 'creeps'
The joke was in reference to Stronach's relationship with Conservative MP Peter MacKay. Stronach criticized the comment, calling it exactly the kind of remark that puts women off entering politics. Klein stood by his joke. “A roast is a roast is a roast,” he told ...
